-- This file is generated from ExampleFile.ump --


MODULE Status
  
  VAR 
    state : { status_Open , status_Closing , status_Closed , status_Opening , status_HalfOpen }; 
    event : { buttonOrObstacle , reachBottom , reachTop };      
  ASSIGN
    init(state) := status_Open;    
  TRANS
    ( (state = status_Closing) -> (
      (event = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = status_Opening)  |
      (event = reachBottom & next(state) = status_Closed)  ) ) &
    ( (state = status_Opening) -> (
      (event = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = status_HalfOpen)  |
      (event = reachTop & next(state) = status_Open)  ) ) &
    ( (state = status_Open) -> (
       event = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = status_Closing) ) &
    ( (state = status_Closed) -> (
       event = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = status_Opening) ) &
    ( (state = status_HalfOpen) -> (
       event = buttonOrObstacle & next(state) = status_Opening) )
  
MODULE main
  
  VAR 
    status : Status;
